primaryPhoto.description:
Nominated for Best Musical Revival,  Best Actor in a Musical (Daniel Mays), Best Actress in a Musical (Marisha Wallace), Best Actor in a Supporting Role In a Musical (Cedric Neal), Outstanding Musical Contribution, Best Theatre Choreographer, Best Costume Design, Best Set Design and Best Lighting Design at the Olivier Awards 2024
Join GUYS & DOLLS as The Bridge transforms for one of the greatest musicals of all time.
Book Immersive Standing Tickets – From £25
Book Seated Tickets 
Be transported to the streets of Manhattan in GUYS & DOLLS, an immersive revival directed by Nicholas Hytner. Stand right in the centre of the action and move around the stage area with immersive tickets. Or sit around the auditorium with seated tickets, where you will never be more than four rows away from the action of the stage area.
Featuring the Broadway classics Luck Be a Lady, Sit Down You’re Rockin’ The Boat, Adelaide’s Lament, Guys & Dolls and more. Starring Owain Arthur, Jonathan Andrew Hume, George Ioannides, Celinde Schoenmaker and Timmika Ramsay.
Book your GUYS & DOLLS theatre tickets with LOVEtheatre today!
